view.title.createProjectTemplate:
[Open a folder](command:vscode.openFolder) that contains a .NET project or create a new project.
[Create New Project](command:dotrush.createProjectTemplate)
configuration.description.additionalWork: Additional MSBuild arguments to pass to the workspace.
configuration.description.roslyn.skipUnr: Determines if unrecognized projects are skipped when projects are opened.
configuration.description.roslyn.loadMet: Determines if metadata from existing output assemblies is loaded instead of opening referenced projects.
